mapper.update: update sms_log set sms_log_content = #{smsLogContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sms_log_time = #{smsLogTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sms_log_company_id = #{smsLogCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_send = #{isSend,jdbcType=BIT}, send_result = #{sendResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_code = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_no = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_tag = #{businessTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sms_log_id = #{smsLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sms_log_id, sms_log_content, sms_log_time, sms_log_company_id, is_send, send_result, receive_phone, result_code, business_no, business_tag from sms_log where sms_log_id = #{smsLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select sms_log_id, sms_log_content, sms_log_time, sms_log_company_id, is_send, send_result, receive_phone, result_code, business_no, business_tag from sms_log
select sms_log_id, sms_log_content, sms_log_time, sms_log_company_id, is_send, send_result, receive_phone, result_code, business_no, business_tag from sms_log where business_no = #{businessNo}
